text:
What Are the Most Important Things Students Should Learn in School?

In your opinion, what are the most important things students should learn in school? What is the most important thing you have learned in school? How has this knowledge affected your life? How do you think it will help your success in the future?

In my opinion, the ability to be disciplined is one of the most important lessons to learn in school.  School can't teach you everything that you need in the world.  However, it can teach you how to be disciplined in pursuing your goals.

However, it can teach you how to be disciplined in pursuing your goals.  Discipline is the ability to do what you know is right even when you don't want to.

However, it can teach you how to be disciplined in pursuing your goals.  Discipline is the ability to do what you know is right even when you don't want to. Besides being disciplined, I believe creativity is an important skill that should be learned in school.  Creativity is the ability to think outside the box.  I do believe that this is a skill that can be trained.  In school, I took classes like art or even my speech classes that focused on creativity.  At first, I was afraid to be creative.  With time, I learned to start thinking outside of the box more.  Creativity allowed me to solve challenging problems inside school and outside of school.

Besides being disciplined, I believe creativity is an important skill that should be learned in school.  Creativity is the ability to think outside the box.  I do believe that this is a skill that can be trained.  In school, I took classes like art or even my speech classes that focused on creativity.  At first, I was afraid to be creative.  With time, I learned to start thinking outside of the box more.  Creativity allowed me to solve challenging problems inside school and outside of school.

When I face challenges today in my job, I think back about certain tasks in school that focused on creativity.  For example, in one of my classes we had to write a series of papers that were judged by the class.  At first, I was very afraid to write outside of the norm.  My classmates judged those papers very harshly.

In my opinion, the ability to be disciplined is one of the most important lessons to learn in school.  School can't teach you everything that you need in the world.  However, it can teach you how to be disciplined in pursuing your goals.  Discipline is the ability to do what you know is right even when you don't want to.  I remember many times in school where I wanted to do something more entertaining instead of my schoolwork.  I wanted to read a book or play video games.  I had to learn to focus on my responsibilities instead of my desires.

Besides being disciplined, I believe creativity is an important skill that should be learned in school.  Creativity is the ability to think outside the box.  I do believe that this is a skill that can be trained.  In school, I took classes like art or even my speech classes that focused on creativity.  At first, I was afraid to be creative.  With time, I learned to start thinking outside of the box more.  Creativity allowed me to solve challenging problems inside school and outside of school.

When I face challenges today in my job, I think back about certain tasks in school that focused on creativity.  For example, in one of my classes we had to write a series of papers that were judged by the class.  At first, I was very afraid to write outside of the norm.  My classmates judged those papers very harshly.  I learned that if I wanted to be successful, I had to think outside of the box.  When I took more risks with my writing, my classmates responded much more favorably.  

With discipline and creativity, I think you can accomplish many great things in your life.  I do believe that these valuable lessons helped me to achieve a lot in my life.  I also believe these two skills will continue to benefit me as I get older.
